bActive: Whether this MediaPlayer is active and its event will be recorded when the 'Record' button is pressed.
bRecordMediaFrame: Whether this MediaPlayer is active and the image frame will be recorded when the 'Record' button is pressed.
ImageFormat: The image format we wish to record to.
CompressionQuality:
An image format specific compression setting.
For EXRs, either 0 (Default) or 1 (Uncompressed)
For PNGs & JPEGs, 0 (Default) or a value between 1 (worst quality, best compression) and 100 (best quality, worst compression)
bResetAlpha:
If the format support it, set the alpha to 1 (or 255).
@note Removing alpha increase the memory foot print.
